item.title: Euruko 2012 Trip Report
item.description: Last week, I was able to attend Euruko 2012 in Amsterdam with a few of my colleagues from Avarteq. We arrived thursday night, hence we missed the boat party at thursday night. The conference was held in the Pathé Tuschinski. Pathé Tuschinski is a beautiful movie theatre. Nearly 600 attendees occupied the theatre, quite amazing, as the “Happy Friday Hug” depicts. My favorite talk at the conference was “JRuby, dudes!” by Charles Nutter.
